wikipedia_page.main:
Danielle Perry (born 4 June 1980) is an English radio presenter and musician.
Perry studied for her BA (Hons) Music degree at Southampton University. After graduating, she started doing her apprenticeship / making the tea at various local radio station across the south coast.

response: In November and December 2020, Champion covered the 7pm-10pm weeknight show on Absolute Radio whilst the show's usual presenter Danielle Perry was on maternity leave.
